summary: The sixth season of "Game of Thrones" aired on HBO from April to June 2016, with 10 episodes. It cost over $100 million to make. The story is based on George R.R. Martin's books but includes new plots. The Starks win a big battle, and Jon Snow becomes King in the North. Daenerys Targaryen gains power among the Dothraki. Cersei Lannister blows up a church to avoid trial and becomes queen. Arya Stark finishes her training and returns home. Bran Stark becomes the Three-Eyed Raven. The season got lots of praise and won many Emmy Awards.
title: Game of Thrones season 6
